byline.contributor: Waqar Gillani contributed reporting from Lahore, Pakistan.

abstract: Suicide bombing in Pakistan's Punjab Province kills at least 10 people, including senior provincial minister Shuja Khanzada; it is unclear who is responsible for attack, though sectarian militants have threatened Khanzada.
lead_paragraph: Shuja Khanzada, the home minister of Punjab Province, was killed along with at least 10 others in a bomb attack during a political meeting.

headline.main: Provincial Minister in Pakistan Is Killed in Suicide Bombing
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bombing Kills Minister in Pakistan

snippet: Shuja Khanzada, the home minister of Punjab Province, was killed along with at least 10 others in a bomb attack during a political meeting.
